name: Upload a new member from Status Hero into Google Sheets
description:
Make lists members in Status Hero and checks whether all members exist in Google Sheets. If not, a new row with the missing (new) member's data is added in Google Sheets. By this way the list of members in Google Sheets is kept up to date.
In this template is used [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1K8YOYylTFlrRdeopyVBN7R4hjrhnYOJTBX9DAxthl9U/edit?usp=sharing) Spread Sheet.
